# Methodology

```{r}
# Data Preparation
original_df <- read_csv("Data/electric-car-sales-share/electric-car-sales-share.csv")

countries <- selected_countries <- c("China", "India", "Japan", "Austria", "Finland", "Norway")

cleaned_data <- original_df %>%
  rename(
    country = Entity,
    code = Code,
    year = Year,
    electric_car_share = `Share of new cars that are electric`
  ) %>%
  filter(year >= 2013, year <= 2023, country %in% countries) %>%
  drop_na()

```
